mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User(user_id, username, password, salt, phone_number, email, avatar, register_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{avatar}, #{registerTime})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, username, password, salt, phone_number, email, avatar, register_time FROM User WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT user_id, username, password, salt, phone_number, email, avatar, register_time FROM User WHERE username = #{username}
